mapper.update:
update menu
menu_str = #{menuStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_num = #{menuNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
parent_str = #{parentStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update menu set menu_str = #{menuStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_num = #{menuNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, parent_str = #{parentStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_num = #{parentNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_order = #{menuOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_id = #{modifyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modify_user = #{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, show_type = #{showType,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select m.id, m.menu_str, m.menu_num, m.parent_id, m.parent_str, m.parent_num, m.menu_order, m.url, m.remark, m.show_type from menu m LEFT JOIN role_menu_rel rm ON rm.menu_id = m.id LEFT JOIN role r ON rm.role_id = r.id where r.id = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND m.show_type = 1
